products.title: Gleneagles Stripe Granite Roman Blind
products.description: Gleneagles feature several bold stripes combining darker blues and blacks with neutral creams and whites. Their granite striped gleneagles fabric features a navy blue and black blend striped paired with cream and red stripes. The striking red and cream stripes has blue thread interwoven into the colour, meaning a softer blend of colours. Product id: db-rom0979 fabric colour: granite material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Gleneagles Stripe Silver Roman Blind
products.description: Gleneagles feature several bold stripes combining darker blues and blacks with neutral creams and whites. Their silver striped gleneagles fabric features a grey/brown blend paired with cream and white stripes. The soft cream and white stripes has brown/grey interwoven into the colour, meaning a softer blend of colours. Product id: db-rom0978 fabric colour: silver material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Ascot Stripe White Roman Blind
products.description: The ultimate in graceful grandeur, the ascot striped roman blind in white will sit timelessly in any window. The cloth has an unusually silky quality, while being woven of fibres which trap air for maximum insulation. So, whether you choose to hang these blinds upstairs or down, you can be assured youre investing in a piece enriched with timeless style. Product id: db-rom1093 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Ascot Stripe Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Invest in the classic style of the ascot striped roman blind in ivory to add a classic expression to your room. Versatile around all your decorating needs, this strong stripe will add fresh lines in a glossy silken fabric. This is not only a design asset but it also acts as an excellent insulator for those chilly evenings. Product id: db-rom1092 fabric colour: ivory material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Ascot Stripe Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Do you have a tricky window that needs precisely the right material? Then look no further. The ascot striped roman blind in fashionable grey is ideal. Woven in a blend of matte stripes and silky yarns, youll not only be investing in a roman blind in a fabric which falls flawlessly, youre also insulating your home against winter chills and evening drafts. Product id: db-rom1091 fabric colour: grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
